data.name: Divinity Chronicles: Journey to the West Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: From Z Studio’s original roguelike deck building title, Divinity Chronicles: Journey to the West, comes the complete soundtrack composed by Zheng Deng and performed by Xiao Xu Studio. This sound track includes the full score from the initial game with more than 48 minutes of music. Enjoy on the audio device of your choice in high quality mp3 and wav formats. This soundtrack provides fans with a growing set of music, with more tracks to be added as Divnity Chronicles continues to expand in the future.
